meanings.definition: Emitting light when exposed to radiation
meanings.sent1: The fluorescent stars on the ceiling glowed brightly in the dark room.
meanings.sent2: The fluorescent paint on the walls made the room bright and colorful.
meanings.sent3: The fluorescent stickers on the notebook seemed to light up magically.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was so radiant, it was like a fluorescent beacon in the room.
meanings.sent5: The fluorescent glow of the fireflies lit up the night sky beautifully.

meanings.definition: A type of light bulb that emits light when electricity passes through it
meanings.sent1: The fluorescent in the lamp flickered before shining brightly.
meanings.sent2: She replaced the old bulb with a new fluorescent in the kitchen.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to catch the fluorescent light on the wall.
meanings.sent4: The idea sparked in his mind like a fluorescent bulb turning on.
meanings.sent5: The room was filled with a soft, comforting glow from the fluorescent above.
